ai-patthana24.20:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of all that had been made.
ai-patthana24.20:3.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of conflict.
ai-patthana24.20:6.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to a refuge, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.20:8.1_0: One who doesn’t give rise to a refuge, with a cause and conditioned phenomena.
ai-patthana24.20:10.1_0: One does not give rise to a hindrance of hindrances, a teaching, and a cause of reason.
ai-patthana24.20:12.1_0: or liberally or defilement arises in another. This is the cause of opposite causes.
